# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to meet your needs perfectly. Given its value and quality, I believe it's worth more than $80 to you. Considering its exceptional benefits, I propose a special introductory price of $95 for you today. This is an exclusive opportunity to own this product at a premium rate before we adjust our pricing strategy. Don't miss out on this chance to experience the full potential of our product. Let me know if you're interested, and we can proceed with the transaction. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $95. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $95
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
